com.gemplus.opencard.terminal.apduio
Class ApduIOCardTerminal

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminal
        |
        +--com.gemplus.opencard.terminal.apduio.ApduIOCardTerminal
public class ApduIOCardTerminal
extends opencard.core.terminal.CardTerminal
implements opencard.core.terminal.Pollable

Pure Java CardTerminal dedicated to send APDUs to the JavaCard Simulator coming with the JavaCard Development Kit. This CardTerminal is built on top of the Sun ApduIO classes

Version:
$Id: ApduIOCardTerminal.java,v 0.1 2001/07/05 08:35:01 root Exp root $
Author:
Laurent Lagosanto (lago@research.gemplus.com)
